EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to the random winner of the Personal Care Publication survey conducted by MD
EmailTemplate.name: Personal Care Publication - Survey Winner
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulatons - Univar Personal Care Publication Survey Random Winner!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Personal Care Survey Random Winner
Joel,
You recently completed the Univar Personal Care Publications Survey. We are pleased to inform you that you were selected as the winner in the random drawing for a $100 gift card!
Your Sales Representative, Joni Worthington may be in contact with you soon to verify your contact information.
In the meantime, if you have any questions please feel free to call us at 877-203-0045.
Thank you,
Univar Market Development
ChemCare
Univar USA
Personal Care
This email was sent from Univar USA Inc.
17425 NE Union Hill Rd., Redmond, WA 98052
